sn10.2:3.1: 2 With an Native Spirit Named Sakka
sn10.2:4.1: At one time the Buddha was staying near Rājagaha, on the Vulture’s Peak Mountain.
sn10.2:4.2: Then a spirit named Sakka went up to the Buddha,

sn10.2:6.3: it’s unworthy for a wise person
sn10.2:6.4: to not think of the other with compassion.
